homePage.appDescription: Limitless is a car rental app. All our cars are carefully inspected. Easily rent a car using our map system and find one near you.
homePage.Location de voiture entre particuliers e: Peer-to-peer and professional car rentals insured by AXA

carsBanner.Voitures Vérifiées-desc: All our vehicles are carefully inspected, as are your documents. Start your journey with peace of mind and create your account today.
carsBanner.Notre équipe est disponible à tout momen: Our team is available anytime to assist you, whether you face a breakdown or have questions.
carsBanner.Réservation Facile-desc: Book a car in just a few clicks with our fast and intuitive platform. It's simple and efficient.

homePage.Notez votre expérience et partagez vos r: Rate your experience and share your feedback to help the Limitless community improve.
homePage.Gérez vos documents comme votre permis d: Securely manage your documents, such as your driver's license and ID.
homePage.Modifiez et envoyez vos documents offici: Edit and submit official documents, such as your driver's license and ID, securely.
homePage.Consultez et modifiez vos réservations e: Easily view and modify your bookings from your dashboard.
homePage.Gérez vos réservations et vos commandes: Manage your reservations and orders. Easily view and modify your bookings from your dashboard.
homePage.Nous avons travaillé avec des milliers d: We’ve worked with thousands of amazing people
homePage.“Un service rapide, pratique et fiable G: “A fast, convenient, and reliable service. Thanks to Limitless, I booked a car in just a few minutes.”
homePage.“J'ai réservé une voiture pour un week-e: “I rented a car for the weekend, and the service was exceptional. An easy-to-use interface and responsive customer support.”
homePage.“J'adore utiliser limitless! Le choix de: “I love using Limitless! The vehicle selection is vast, and everything is well-organized. I’ll never rent any other way.”
homePage.“Une expérience sans tracas ! Les véhicu: “A hassle-free experience! The vehicles are always clean and available. Limitless has completely changed how I travel.”
homePage.“Louer une voiture n'a jamais été aussi: “Renting a car has never been so simple and fast. Thank you, Limitless, for this quality service!”
homePage.“L'application est intuitive et l'assist: “The app is intuitive, and the customer support is great. If you need a car, Limitless is the perfect solution.”
homePage.Comment fonctionne le partage de voiture: How does car sharing work with Limitless?
homePage.limitless permet aux utilisateurs de lou: Limitless allows users to rent cars from others or rent out their own vehicles when not in use. Simply browse cars available in your area, book for the desired period, and pick up the car. The entire process is managed via our app.
homePage.Comment puis-je louer une voiture sur li: How can I rent a car on Limitless?
homePage.Pour louer une voiture, téléchargez simp: To rent a car, simply download the Limitless app, create an account, browse available cars near you, select the car you want, choose your rental period, and complete the booking. Payment is securely processed via the app.
homePage.Oui, tous les véhicules listés sur limit: Yes, all vehicles listed on limitless are covered by comprehensive insurance during the rental period. Our insurance covers damages, theft, and liability, providing you with peace of mind during your rental.
homePage.Quelles sont les conditions pour louer u: What are the conditions for renting a car?
homePage.Pour louer une voiture, vous devez avoir: To rent a car, you must be at least 21 years old, possess a valid driver's license, and meet the driver profile verification criteria of our platform. Some vehicles may have additional conditions based on the owner's preferences.
homePage.Comment rendre une voiture après la loca: How do I return a car after the rental?
homePage.Vous pouvez rendre la voiture à l'endroi: You can return the car at the location specified in your booking. The app will guide you through the return process, including vehicle inspection. If you encounter any issues during the return, you can contact our customer service via the app.
homePage.Que faire si j'ai un problème avec la vo: What should I do if I have an issue with the car during the rental?
homePage.Si vous rencontrez un problème avec la v: If you experience an issue with the car during the rental, you can report it directly through the app. Our support team will assist you, and depending on the nature of the issue, we may arrange for a replacement vehicle or provide a solution.
homePage.Puis-je louer ma propre voiture via limi: Can I rent out my own car through limitless?
homePage.Oui ! Si vous possédez une voiture, vous: Yes! If you own a car, you can list it on the limitless platform and earn money by renting it out. Simply sign up as a vehicle owner, upload your car's details and availability, and our app will handle the bookings.
homePage.Que se passe-t-il si je rends la voiture: What happens if I return the car late?
homePage.Les retards de retour sont soumis à des: Late returns are subject to additional charges based on the hourly or daily rental rate. To avoid these fees, make sure to return the car on time. If you anticipate a delay, please inform the vehicle owner through the app.
homePage.Puis-je prolonger ma période de location: Can I extend my rental period?
homePage.Oui, vous pouvez prolonger votre période: Yes, you can extend your rental period directly through the app as long as the car is available for the new dates. You can request an extension, and if the vehicle owner agrees, your booking will be updated.
homePage.Comment contacter le service client ?: How do I contact customer service?
homePage.Si vous avez besoin d'assistance, vous p: If you need assistance, you can contact our customer support team via the app. Simply go to the 'Help' section and submit your request; a representative will respond promptly.

newPage.main-desc: With limitless, rent out your car and turn it into an additional source of income. Earn your salary easily by sharing your vehicle. limitless is the perfect solution to make your car profitable with ease.
newPage.Verifer vos documents et commencez à gag: Verify your documents and start earning money
newPage.Louez votre voiture et transformez votre: Rent your car and transform the way you earn money
newPage.De plus en plus d'hôtes trouvent une vér: More and more hosts find true satisfaction in renting out their car and generating passive income. It's a simple and secure way to increase your income, without daily effort.
newPage.Rejoignez des milliers d'hôtes qui parta: Join thousands of hosts who share their vehicle to generate extra income in a flexible and profitable way.
newPage.Découvrez la satisfaction de recevoir de: Experience the satisfaction of receiving regular payments by renting out your car during your unused time.
newPage.Maximisez vos revenus en mettant votre v: Maximize your income by making your vehicle available to others while staying in control of your schedule.
newPage.Profitez d'une plateforme intuitive qui: Enjoy an intuitive platform that allows you to easily manage the rental of your car while staying flexible with your availability.

hostIncentives.Proposez votre voiture sur notre platefo: List your car on our platform and easily generate additional income.
hostIncentives.Vous avez le contrôle total sur la dispo: You have full control over the availability, rates, and rental conditions of your vehicle.
hostIncentives.Votre véhicule est protégé par une assur: Your vehicle is protected by comprehensive insurance during each rental, for complete peace of mind.

newPage.Ajoutez, modifiez ou supprimez vos annon: Add, edit, or delete your listings to better manage your rentals.
newPage.Consultez et gérez vos réservations avec: View and manage your bookings with a simple and intuitive dashboard.
newPage.Utilisez notre système de messagerie pou: Use our messaging system to stay in touch with your clients.
newPage.Collectez des retours pour améliorer vos: Collect feedback to improve your services and attract more clients.
newPage.Téléchargez et organisez vos documents i: Download and organize your important documents securely.

aidePage.Trouvez des réponses à vos questions ci-: Find answers to your questions below or use the search bar to refine your search.
